name: Bike Rush
description: Express yourself as a king of the road. Leave the pursuers behind and avenge your syndicate in Bike Rush! You have an extra option to race in VR!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (32-bit) Processor: 3.0 Ghz (2 Core) Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 6850 (GeForce GTX 960 4GB for VR) DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 4 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) Processor: 3.0 Ghz (4 Core) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 760, Radeon HD7850 (GeForce GTX 1060 for VR) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 4 GB available space
